Toggle Menu

Riak Salt Module

Author: David Boucha <boucha@gmail.com>

cluster_commit

Syntax

salt.modules.riak.cluster_commit( )

Details

Commit Cluster Changes

CLI Example:

salt '*' riak.cluster_commit

cluster_join

Syntax

salt.modules.riak.cluster_join(
								riak_user=None,
								riak_host=None
								)

Details

Join a Riak cluster

CLI Example:

salt '*' riak.cluster_join <user> <host>

cluster_plan

Syntax

salt.modules.riak.cluster_plan( )

Details

Review Cluster Plan

CLI Example:

salt '*' riak.cluster_plan

member_status

Syntax

salt.modules.riak.member_status( )

Details

Get cluster member status

CLI Example:

salt '*' riak.member_status

start

Syntax

salt.modules.riak.start( )

Details

Start Riak

CLI Example:

salt '*' riak.start

stop

Syntax

salt.modules.riak.stop( )

Details

Stop Riak

CLI Example:

salt '*' riak.stop
